text: Syed Ishtiaq Ahmed Jaffrey born on 29 March 1939, better known as his stage name Jagdeep, was an Indian actor, director and comedian. He has appeared in more than 400 movies. He has played Soorma Bhopali in Sholay (1975), Machchar in Purana Mandir (1984), Salman Khan's dad in Andaz Apna Apna (1994) and directed the movie Soorma Bhopali. He was born in Datia, Madhya Pradesh.. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian comedians Category:Indian movie directors Category:Indian child actors
title: Jagdeep
